metadata.name: The Door
metadata.description:
My original hand made oil painting on canvas, 40 x 60 cm (15,748 x 23,622 in.), Limassol, Cyprus, 2017

We always strive to find the main door to enter the new reality, new opportunity or new life. We are constantly seeking for it on our ways in the big cities, trying to catch the most brilliant sight, the most expensive view, the stunning exterior.

And suddenly, one day in a small old age town of a dozens hundreds of years, you see a sight of eternity that reveals everything to you.

The inscription on the door is in Cypriot Greek saying - "Knock at the door, I am inside and will open to you".

Matthew 7:7:  
"Make a request, and it will be answered; what you are searching for you will get; give the sign, and the door will be open to you..."
